column4: hey, anyone have any expereince with luks?  I'm trying to follow this: http://www.backtrack-linux.org/forums/showthread.php?t=43665 and I could use some help, I'm on backtrack, but noones active on there channel...
why duel boot with backtrack im just wondering

actually, I normally run arch linux, but needed a debian base for school, so I figured I'd try backtrack because it can do everything ubuntu can, but comes with more hacking programs, and those might be fun to mess with when I'm in class...
yeah, ubuntu's great for new users and pros, but I feel like the extra tools could be fun.
